# AppExtensionPoint.Error.hostMustBeApplicationOrAppExtension

**Case**

An error that indicates the definition of an extension point in an unsupported target.

## Declaration

```swift
case hostMustBeApplicationOrAppExtension
```

## Getting the error codes

- **AppExtensionPoint.Error.hostMustDefineAppExtensionPoint(_:)**: An error that indicates an attempt to define an extension point outside an app.
- **AppExtensionPoint.Error.hostMustHaveBundleIdentifier**: An error that indicates the host app is missing its bundle identifier.
- **AppExtensionPoint.Error.invalidAppExtensionPoint**: An error that indicates an attempt to bind to an unknown extension point.
- **AppExtensionPoint.Error.unspecifiedAppExtensionPointName**: An error that indicates the specified extension point is unknown.
